Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Outdoor Camera w/Metal Housing
Reviews.Author: Rick   "Communications Tech"
Reviews.Content: The major problem I've experienced with this camera is the wide angle lens.It was advertised as wide angle however, for my application it was not wide enough.I had to install a 2nd camera to provide ample coverage.The housing is metal and shorter than most other outdoor camera enclosures.I have found that this design is far superior than the most other outdoor camera housings.The picture quality and night vision were very good.If you're requirements are for wide area coverage I would not purchase this product.However, for all other applications the price is right.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD security camera, high resolution of 700 TVL, enabling to obtain more natural high-definition video
Build-in 6-15mm varifocal lens and 30 large infrared leds
Weatherproof aluminum outdoor housing, stand for use in all weather conditions. Real weatherproof housing resistant to heavy rain and snow
Heavy duty bracket, pan 360 degree, tilts 90 degree
Package included: 1 x Sony camera, 1 x 12V DC power supply, 1 x camera bracket and 1 x security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Built-in SONY Effio CCD CCTV Outdoor Infrared Security Surveillance Camera Wide Dynamic Range WDR DSP 6-15mm Zoom Focus Lens Camera for DVR Home Surveillance System with Power Supply, Security Camera Bracket and Free Warning Sticker A39
